long_description: Appropriate for almost any outdoor activity, the men's Arc'teryx Epsilon LT Jacket combines the moderate mid-layer warmth of fleece with the durable woven face of a soft shell. Stretchy nylon/spandex face features a durable water repellent finish to shed light precipitation. Lightweight polyester fleece is bonded to the back for light warmth. Arc'teryx Epsilon LT Jacket offers zippered hand pockets and a laminated sleeve pocket. Gusseted cuffs pull on/off easily over gloves; hem drawcord seals out drafts.
short_description: Appropriate for almost any outdoor activity, the men's Arc'teryx Epsilon LT Jacket combines the moderate mid-layer warmth of fleece with the durable woven face of a soft shell.
